from app import create_app
from models.change_request import ChangeRequest

app = create_app()
with app.app_context():
    # Get recent CRs
    crs = ChangeRequest.query.order_by(ChangeRequest.cr_id.desc()).limit(5).all()
    for cr in crs:
        print(f''=== CR-{cr.cr_id} ==='')
        print(f''Overall justification: {cr.justification[:50] if cr.justification else ""None""}...'')
        if cr.sub_items_data and len(cr.sub_items_data) > 0:
            mat = cr.sub_items_data[0]
            print(f''First material: {mat.get(""material_name"")}'')
            print(f''Per-material justification: ""{mat.get(""justification"", ""NOT FOUND"")}""'')
        print()
")

hooks.prompt: A code edit was just made. Remind the developer: 'Code changed! Consider running the codebase-auditor agent to review changes for errors, duplicates, and best practices.'
